feed.title: SAP Community - Certification
feed.subtitle: Certification blog posts in SAP Community

entry.title: How students can get certified free and FAST in SAP (Less than 7 hours!)
entry.content:
Hi Everyone, 

I’d like to share information about a new type of certification available for SAP partners, employees, and students. This certification, known as the business certification, is now accessible free of charge through the SAP Learning Hub, student edition. The name of the certification is "Positioning SAP Business Suite," and it provides a comprehensive overview of the SAP Business Suite concept. 

This certification covers how consultants align SAP Business Suite features with customer infrastructure and communicate effectively to ensure a successful implementation. It's a fantastic introduction to SAP's offerings and an efficient way to earn an SAP certification. With just one or two days of study, you can enhance your CV with this new credential. 

 

Step 1: Register for your free subscription 

 To begin, the first step is to successfully verify and sign up for SAP Learning Hub, student edition. I have detailed the full process for registration here in this blog to guide you through it. 

 

Step 2: Find the content you need to study 

 Once your registration is complete and your subscription is activated, the SAP Business Suite learning journey and certification will become visible within the Student Zone upon logging in with your newly activated free subscription. (Scroll down a bit and you will see it in the first content carousel.) 

Alternately, you can access the two relevant courses here: 

1. Discovering SAP for Students 

2. Positioning SAP Business Suite (This is the content gated for successful registrants to SAP Learning Hub, student edition. You can’t see it until go you through this process.) 

 

Step 3: Start studying and do the practical exercise 

You can get yourself familiar with SAP solutions through hands-on practice based on a real business case. In this video, you can see how it works and some tips on the first step of the practice. 

 

 Note: Most of the knowledge required to pass the exam can be acquired through the courses listed above. However, I recommend you better familiarize yourself with SAP Business Data Cloud before proceeding - this is the most difficult component of the exam for some students. Read more here: Positioning SAP Business Data Cloud. 

 

Step 4: Scheduling your exam  

After completing the practical exercise, your ability to schedule your exam will be unlocked.  

Follow the example demo here but, be sure to use the exam code for SAP Business Suite instead of what you see in the demo. 

 If at any point you need support with the process, please go to the SAP Certification support page. 

 Best of luck and congratulations in advance for earning your first official SAP credential. 

Regards, 

David

entry.title: Supporting the Cloud-Journey: A New Chapter for our SAP HANA Cloud Certification
entry.content:
As part of our SAP Certification for Operations Partners program, we offer a range of certifications that recognize partners delivering high-quality services for SAP® solutions and supporting customers on their digital transformation journeys. To reflect the growing importance of cloud technologies, we’ve updated our SAP HANA operations certification, now titled “SAP HANA Cloud and database operations.”

The cloud is no longer a destination but a continuous journey of optimization and innovation. To help our partners confidently lead their customers on this path, we’ve enhanced the certification to focus on the practical, day-to-day realities of SAP HANA Cloud deployments.

The updated certification places stronger emphasis on cloud-related content and highlights the core competencies required for:

  • Seamless migrations to SAP HANA Cloud
  • Operational management of SAP HANA Cloud instances, including performance monitoring and security

By demonstrating these skills, partners reinforce their role in confidently guiding customers through every phase of their cloud journey.

With its expanded scope, the certification now reflects a partner’s end-to-end expertise across the SAP HANA Cloud lifecycle - serving as a strong differentiator in delivering sustained value in the cloud.

Existing certified partners will benefit from these enhancements at no additional cost and will complete the extended content during their next re-certification audit.

 

SAP Certifications for Operations Partners - overview of certifications

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Information on the certification program for operations partners and an overview of all certified partners can be found in the SAP Operations Partner Guide.

entry.title: Your First Step into AI with SAP: Start Learning, Get Certified, Drive Innovation
entry.content:
The world of business technology is evolving rapidly, and AI is leading the charge. This is more than just a trend; it’s an opportunity for everyone to reshape how businesses run. If you're curious about how artificial intelligence fits into the SAP landscape and wondering how to get started, you’re in the right place.

Whether you’re a developer, consultant, business user, or architect, SAP has created accessible and relevant resources to help you take your first steps into AI confidently. Let’s break it down.

 

Why Start Learning AI Now?

AI isn’t just futuristic, it’s happening now, and it’s transforming industries in real time. SAP’s Business AI strategy is about embedding intelligence into business processes to drive better decisions, automate tasks, and deliver exceptional user experiences.

By beginning your AI journey today, you’ll:

  • Understand how AI is being applied across SAP solutions
  • Gain the skills to build or extend intelligent applications on SAP Business Technology Platform
  • Get ahead in your career by being part of an emerging and in-demand field

 

Get Started: Follow Self-Paced Learning Journeys

SAP provides structured learning paths for you to build your understanding and prepare you for the SAP Generative AI Developers certification.

Here’s what’s included:

Exploring the SAP Business AI Portfolio: Get a broad view of SAP’s AI offerings and how they solve real business challenges.

Using SAP AI Core on SAP BTP: Manage AI solutions with SAP AI Core and AI Launchpad.

LLM Fundamentals for Your Use Case: Learn how large language models (LLMs) work and how to use them effectively.

Prompting & Problem Solving with Generative AI Hub: Apply advanced prompting strategies to tackle real business use cases

 

 

 

 

Dive Deeper: Join Live Sessions Designed for Beginners

As part of your SAP Learning Hub subscription, you can join live expert-led sessions designed to help you grasp the fundamentals of AI in the SAP landscape, no prior AI experience required.

  • Introduction to SAP Business AI
    Learn SAP’s vision for Business AI, get familiar with key generative AI concepts, and see how tools like Joule are transforming enterprise applications.
  • Introduction to Agentic AI
    Discover how SAP is building intelligent agents using techniques like Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) and Multi-Context Planning (MCP) and why data foundation matters in enterprise AI.

These sessions offer a hands-on, approachable starting point and are a great way to build confidence before getting certified.

 

Become Certified: SAP Generative AI Developer

When you're ready, validate your knowledge and skills with the SAP Certification for Generative AI Developers. It’s a great way to stand out, demonstrate your expertise, and build confidence as a next-gen SAP professional.

 

Get Started Today

Starting your AI journey with SAP doesn’t have to be overwhelming. With live sessions, structured learning journeys, and a clear certification path, you have all the tools you need to grow. And the best part? You’re learning with a global community of professionals committed to innovation. Plus, take advantage of local and free hands-on SAP CodeJam events to deepen your skills, connect with experts, and apply what you’ve learned in a collaborative, real-world environment.

 

So if you’ve been thinking, “I want to learn AI but don’t know where to begin,” this is your sign. Start small, stay curious, and let SAP guide you toward your AI-powered future.

Explore. Learn. Get certified. Drive innovation.

entry.title: "Certification Elevated My Confidence and Brand": How Rudy’s Commitment to Learning Inspires Others
entry.content:
Rudy Abrahams describes himself as “an introvert who is not shy” — a lifelong learner, activist for equity and equality, and a passionate advocate for healthy living. Growing up in humble beginnings in South Africa, Rudy’s early life shaped the values he holds today: resilience, fairness, and a deep belief in continuous self-improvement. Now an SAP employee based in Singapore, he balances his high-paced career with family life, proudly married to Dorianne for 25 years and raising two sons. 

“I love anything that includes healthy living (in all aspects of health),” Rudy shares. “And I’m a lifelong learner — it’s something I do naturally.” 

A Leadership Journey Across Continents 

Since joining SAP in 2017, Rudy has embraced change, leadership, and growth at every step. Over just eight years, he has held five major roles across five countries, including Head of Presales in EMEA, Head of Digital Transformation Office in Southeast Asia, Head of SAP SuccessFactors in SEA, and President & Country MD in the Philippines. Today, he serves as Head of Industry & Value Advisory for SAP APAC. 

Through it all, Rudy credits his success to self-discipline and focus. His daily routine starts early: "I rise at 5am to meditate, then 45 minutes of exercise, and I start work at 8am. I'm flat out until 6pm daily." His workday is filled with customer engagements, leadership meetings, and supporting SAP’s Customer Advisory Team. 

Leading by Example with SAP Certification 

But despite his busy schedule, personal growth and leading by example are high priorities for Rudy. True to his leadership style, he believes in setting the standard for his team. “I’m not willing to ask my team to do anything I’m not willing to do myself,” he says. 

Rudy Abrahams, Head of Industry & Value Advisory for SAP APACThis was just one of the reasons Rudy made the decision to pursue an SAP Certification. He saw it as an opportunity to inspire through action while enhancing his own skillset. Although the certification was not mandatory for Rudy, he likes to lead from the front. "Closing skills gaps starts with leaders who commit to learning, and certified teams drive better outcomes – it's that simple,” Rudy explains. "I also know that this certification is an investment in my credibility and knowledge." 

He chose to certify in Positioning SAP Business Suite, one of SAP’s newest offerings for all SAP employees and partners. It includes practical exercises that build skills to help position SAP Business Suite, so was the ideal choice to strengthen Rudy’s product and strategic knowledge. But the journey wasn’t always smooth. 

“It was fun upfront, but the exam was fairly tough for me,” he admits. After failing his first attempt, Rudy didn’t give up. “I was disappointed but motivated to pass, so I decided to study hard and rebooked my test.” Passing the exam brought a renewed sense of confidence: “I feel much more confident and liberated now, especially knowing this was not an easy certificate to secure. I feel beyond proud.” 

Transforming Confidence into Connections 

The benefits of certification extended far beyond product-related skills. Rudy found that it increased his visibility and credibility within SAP. “I have elevated my brand in our business,” he says. “I met new colleagues who walked up to me and asked me for tips and insights.” This unexpected networking has created new friendships and stronger professional bonds.  

Beyond professional recognition, the experience boosted Rudy’s personal sense of achievement. "It made me feel like I could achieve just about anything." What’s more, Rudy's example has inspired others to follow his lead: “Many of my colleagues have turned to me and told me they are motivated to do their certification too. It’s a win-win for all, I guess.” 

A Lifelong Learning Mindset 

For Rudy, the journey doesn't stop here. Learning has always been a way of life — a philosophy he’s lived through every chapter of his career and personal growth. Although it requires dedication, time and motivation, he believes it's well worth the investment. “Lifelong learning isn’t a choice anymore, it’s a mindset.” 

As SAP and the wider technology world continue to evolve, Rudy’s story is a reminder that investing in yourself — even when it’s tough — opens new doors, builds new relationships, and paves the way for even greater success. 

Start your own success story    

Did you feel inspired by Rudy’s story? Then kick-start your own success story with SAP today. Benefit from tailored and self-paced learning opportunities that meet you when and where you learn best on SAP Learning site. Get certified to demonstrate your expertise and boost your career.

entry.title: Register Now: SAP Partner- Get Certified Academies for SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition (Q3- 2025)
entry.content:
For SAP Partners only 

We would like to invite you to the upcoming SAP enablement offering: Partner Get- Certified Academies for SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition.

You will need a valid SAP Partner S User ID and a valid SAP Universal ID to access the links and register for the sessions

Dates : 9 to 11th Sept 16th & 17th Sept

  • Option 1: Morning Session: 09:00 AM to 12:00 PM CET
  • Option 2: Evening Session: 04:00 PM to 07:00 PM CET

In Q3 edition of this event, we will run certification academies for the 4 key  SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition - certifications.

  • 9th Sept  - Implementation Consultant – Register (Mandatory to all LOB Certifications)
  • 10th and 11th Sept - Financial Accounting Part 1 & Financial Accounting Part 2- Register
  • 16th Sept  - Sales – Register
  • 17th Sept - Sourcing & Procurement – Register

Description:

Accelerate your timelines to get certified on the SAP S/4HANA Cloud, Public Edition -Certifications! Join this academy to obtain the certification guidance pertaining to the SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition Certification - (SAP Certified Associate – Implementation Consultant) and Line of Business Certifications.

Learning Objective(s):

  • Allowing learners to build familiarity & understand certification guidance across various topics, covered in the SAP Learning Journeys, which reduces the time spent in the self-paced consumption of LJs.
  • Understanding of key concepts, tips & tricks to optimally consume the SAP Learning Journeys while preparing for SAP Certification exam.

Target Audience:

  • SAP S/4HANA - LoB Consultants ( and/or) SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Professionals looking to get certified on SAP S/4HANA Cloud Edition Certifications. 

Roles:

  • Architect, Consultant / Delivery, Developer, Project Manager, Technical Consultant

Join us to fast track your certification journey and reach your certification milestone before the end of 2025!

entry.title: Certification and Beyond: Stories from SAP’s Top Trainers
entry.content:
Tinus Brink and Lisa Merrill have a lot in common: they both work as SAP consultants and trainers; were both commended as SAP’s highest achieving trainers in the 2024 SAP Authorized Trainer Program; and they’re both passionate about their respective hobbies. But the similarities don’t end there. Their deep-rooted commitment for lifelong learning and inspiring others through education shines through everything they do. And both embrace continuous learning through SAP Learning Hub, balancing their professional expertise with rich personal lives and unique interests.  

From Family Support to Global Impact 

Tinus’ SAP career began thanks to his mother-in-law, who took a leap of faith in him and backed his initial journey with a loan on her home. And her belief in him and in SAP paid off. Today, over 20 of Tinus’ family members and friends now work with SAP in some capacity.  

Originally from South Africa, Tinus has been living in Texas for two years and calls it home. With five SAP Certifications under his belt, ‘Tiny’, as he is affectionately known by those he trains, believes knowledge truly is power: “Being the consultant with the answers not only builds confidence but also strengthens your ability to support clients effectively,” he says. “The skills we gain through SAP training unlock new opportunities for growth and success”.  

Over the years, Tinus has had the privilege of participating in inspiring programs like SAP Skills for Africa, the SAP Young Professional Program, and the Dual Study initiative with various universities.  But his love of learning and training extends outside of the workplace. When he’s not exploring new technologies and experimenting with software and AI, he’s coaching rugby in local schools.  

“Supporting others in their growth and development has always been at the heart of my work”, he explains. “I take great pride in helping new talent enter the SAP ecosystem and kick-start their careers”. And it’s never been easier. The flexibility of remote learning through SAP Learning Hub fits perfectly with his lifestyle: “I can study on weekends or evenings without disrupting family time. I’ve already planned two new certifications this year.” 

Helping Others Dive Deeper Into Their Potential 

Lisa Merrill, an SAP consultant and SAP Authorized Trainer from Chicago agrees. “SAP Learning Hub has been a wonderful tool and there are days when I wonder how we lived without it. I am a better trainer because I have a place that I can go to 24/7 to read, review, and practice.”   

Like Tinus, Lisa’s love of learning opened new doors beyond her career. In 1997, while working on a global SAP implementation, she was introduced to the world of scuba diving, completed a course, and it has been a passion ever since. Today, when Lisa isn’t diving 30-120 feet below sea level in the Bahamas with her family, she’s diving into a new project or training a new intake of SAP users in a classroom.  

As her SAP skills deepened, so did her impact. Over her 25+ year career, Lisa has been fortunate to work on consulting projects as well as provide training to SAP clients around the globe. But a clear highlight is her involvement in SAP’s NS2 Serves initiative that provides military veterans with SAP training, certification, and career opportunities after service. The program provides them with new skills and a fresh start. “It is an honor and a privilege,” she fondly recalls. “Having the opportunity to help veterans prepare for SAP Certifications and later hear about the impact it has made on their lives is incredibly rewarding and fulfilling”. 

Lisa is a firm believer that a lack of training is one of the main reasons projects aren’t successful.  Over the years she has seen companies design great systems that never reach their potential because users aren’t sufficiently trained in the systems. “When I train, I hope, in some small way, that I am contributing to the overall success of an implementation,” she shares. “My motto is: When you stop learning, you stop evolving”.   

A Path to Purpose 

For both Lisa and Tinus, SAP Certification wasn’t just a checkbox. It validated their knowledge, sharpened their skills, and opened meaningful new opportunities to support others on their SAP journeys. With SAP Learning Hub, they’ve been able to stay current, fuel their innate curiosity, and continue doing what they both love most: helping others succeed. 

You too can benefit from self-paced learning opportunities that meet you how you learn best. With SAP Learning Hub, you can unlock guided learning resources including live sessions, practice systems and everything you need to get and stay certified and boost your career.

entry.title: Certified to Inspire: Top Trainers Who Never Stop Learning
entry.content:
Behind every great trainer is a journey shaped by curiosity, resilience, and a drive to help others succeed. For Michael Wegelin, Kouassi Mathé, and Angelo Minutella — three of the top trainers commended in the 2024 SAP Authorized Trainer Program — SAP Certification wasn’t just about personal growth. It was about staying relevant, deepening their impact, and unlocking opportunities to support and inspire others in their learning journeys. 

Leading by Example 

Michael Wegelin from Germany is an SAP trainer and ABAP full stack programmer and has been passionate about training since childhood. Back then he bought his first guitar from the money he earned helping his classmates pass their exams. Upon completion of his PhD in physics, he worked as a software engineer and taught coding. He discovered SAP software in 1995 and dedicated four intensive weeks to studying ABAP. Just four weeks later, Michael stepped into the classroom as an SAP trainer and the rest, as they say, is history. 

According to Michael, the best way to learn something is to teach it to other people: “Because I love learning, I love teaching,” he explains. When he’s not staying up-to-date using his SAP Learning Hub subscription, he’s refreshing his memory on long forgotten IT-related subjects with his two children who are studying computer science.   

Michael, who has always led by example, obtained his first SAP Certifications in 1995 and hasn’t looked back. “Learning something new is like discovering a whole new world,” he shares. In 2024 alone, he completed seven learning journeys for free on SAP Learning site, which helped him pass three SAP Certification exams.  

Training with Purpose 

Like Michael, learning has been an integral part of Kouassi Mathé’s life from an early age. “As the son of two teachers, I quickly understood how important training is for oneself and that feeling of joy when knowledge is transferred to others,” he recalls. 

Kouassi, who is based in France, first discovered SAP solutions when his then employer, an SAP trainer, offered him training to implement SAP projects. 18 years later, he works as a Finance and Controlling SAP consultant and an SAP authorized trainer, and the combination is effective. “Training adds value to my consulting activities and vice versa,” he says.  

For Kouassi, training is deeply personal. He’s passionate about knowledge-sharing and mentoring the next generation of talent. “Learning something new gives me the feeling of having taken another step towards growth,” he shares. “What is also important is to be able to share what I have learned.” 

As a father of three, Kouassi balances his demanding work life with raising a family and his passion for sport. Remote training via SAP Learning Hub has made this balance easier: “It allows me to be at home more with my children and still deliver the same quality of training to my students”. 

Driven by Curiosity 

Passionate about travel, being able to offer remote training sessions and access learning materials online has also been a game-changer for Angelo Minutella. It allows him to teach and learn while travelling and hiking around remote areas of Europe in his 4x4 campervan with his family, sometimes for months at a time. When he’s not exploring the continent, he spends his free time tinkering with his Raspberry Pi and coding AI applications. 

Based in Switzerland, Angelo began working with SAP Finance and Controlling in 1999—just a few years after completing his studies in electronical engineering—and gradually began offering SAP training. In 2005, after a company downsizing, Angelo struck out on his own and founded a consultancy company. Over time, training became one of the most fulfilling parts of his work and he has since transitioned many of his sessions online, offering virtual courses that fit with his lifestyle. Staying up –to date with SAP Certifications has been crucial to his success both as an SAP consultant and an SAP authorized trainer.  

“SAP Learning Hub allows me to familiarize myself with new products exactly when I need them for my project work, regardless of my project time or location,” he explains. “Being able to learn something new and expand my skills is a privilege.” 

Shared Lessons and Lasting Impact 

For Michael, Kouassi, and Angelo, learning has never been an obligation. It’s a core part of who they are and offers a pathway to new insights, stronger credibility, and the ability to support others on their professional journeys. Whether they’re leading global teams, mentoring new talent, or exploring new technologies, these trainers are united by a common thread: a passion for learning, and a belief in its power to transform lives. 

You too can benefit from self-paced and free learning opportunities that meet you how you learn best. With SAP Learning Hub, you can unlock guided learning resources including live sessions, practice systems and everything you need to get and stay certified and boost your career.

entry.title: Reigniting Purpose Through SAP Certification
entry.content:
Yasir Sheikh, an SAP Project Manager based in Dubai, has spent more than two decades leading ERP transformations across global firms like IBM, PwC, Deloitte, BearingPoint, and EY. With a career dedicated to bridging business and IT, Yasir has always been passionate about delivering high-impact ERP transformations — and equally committed to continuously upskilling himself along the way. “What drives me most is creating real value for clients while continuously upskilling myself.”

Staying Ahead

In his current role, Yasir leads implementations of SAP Fieldglass and SAP S/4HANA Cloud, managing teams and aligning delivery with clients across regions. “My typical day involves managing project teams, aligning delivery plans with clients, resolving cross-functional issues, and ensuring that SAP solutions are implemented effectively and on time.” Right now, he’s leading a multi-country SAP Fieldglass solution implementation project for a financial institution in the UAE, from planning to post-go-live support.

With cloud adoption accelerating, Yasir saw the need to deepen his knowledge, even after 22 years in the field. He chose the Implementation Consultant - SAP S/4HANA Cloud (Public Edition) Certification to align his hands-on expertise with the latest innovations, and to strengthen his ability to meet client expectations in a cloud-first world. “Although I had extensive experience managing SAP projects, I wanted to update my knowledge to match SAP’s evolving cloud-first strategy,” he explained. “I also wanted to show that at 49, it’s never too late to reinvest in your skills — a message I hope can inspire others in the industry.”

Learning That Connects Directly to Work

Learning something new while managing live client projects wasn’t easy. But Yasir embraced the challenge. “Balancing active client delivery with late-night study sessions required discipline, but the structure of the free SAP Learning site and the relevance of the learning content made it easier to stay motivated.” The learning paid off immediately — not just in knowledge, but in practical application.

“One of the most energizing aspects was applying new knowledge immediately in my real-world projects, for example connecting cloud configuration concepts to actual client discussions.”

New Projects, New Purpose

Completing the certification exam brought both professional and personal rewards. It enhanced Yasir’s credibility with clients, created new career opportunities, and reminded him of why he loves what he does. “It gave me a renewed sense of professional purpose, and reaffirmed my belief that learning is a lifelong journey,” he shares. "It also sparked a desire to give back, to contribute more to the SAP community, and mentor younger professionals."

At this stage of his career, Yasir sees continued learning as essential — not just for growth, but for relevance. “Staying relevant, sharing knowledge, and proving that learning has no age barrier are most important to me.”

Are you ready to begin your SAP journey?  Explore the SAP Learning site and take the first step to transform your future.

entry.title: Get Certified in SAP Sales Cloud V2 with Our Live Session Series!
entry.content:
Are you ready to take your career in sales technology to the next level? Do you want to become a go-to expert in implementing one of the most innovative sales solutions on the market? Then mark your calendars!

SAP Learning is thrilled to announce a brand-new live session series designed to help you ace the SAP Certified Associate - Implementation Consultant - SAP Sales Cloud Version 2 exam!

Click here to explore the full series and register

Why SAP Sales Cloud Version 2?

In today's fast-paced sales environment, businesses need more than just basic CRM. SAP Sales Cloud Version 2 is a game-changer, empowering sales teams with:

  • AI and Machine Learning: Predictive analytics, intelligent recommendations, and automated insights to help reps prioritize leads and close deals faster.
  • Seamless Integration: Connects effortlessly with the broader SAP ecosystem (ERP, S/4HANA, etc.) for a truly end-to-end business process.
  • Modern User Experience: Intuitive, mobile-first design built on SAP Fiori for enhanced usability and adoption.
  • Flexibility & Extensibility: Low-code/no-code options and an API-first approach for easy customization and integration.

This isn't just about managing customer data; it's about driving intelligent engagement and accelerating business growth. As more companies adopt this powerful solution, the demand for skilled implementation consultants is skyrocketing.

Why Get Certified?

Earning your "SAP Certified Associate - Implementation Consultant - SAP Sales Cloud Version 2" certification demonstrates your foundational knowledge and in-depth skills in implementing and administering this cutting-edge solution. It validates that you:

  • Possess a comprehensive understanding of SAP Sales Cloud Version 2 fundamentals.
  • Can actively participate in project teams focusing on Sales Cloud V2 implementations in a mentored role.
  • Are equipped to configure key sales-specific capabilities, manage master data, and understand extensibility options.
  • Understand critical areas like Lead and Opportunity Management, Activities Management, Mobile App capabilities, and the integration of Machine Learning and Generative AI.

This certification is your badge of excellence, differentiating you in the job market and opening doors to exciting career opportunities!

What You'll Get from These Live Sessions:

This exclusive series of live sessions, led by an SAP expert, is quite simply your best shot at prepping for success. You'll walk away with:

  • Comprehensive Coverage: This is a 6-part live session series, each about an hour long, designed to take you through the entire content of the learning journeys.
  • Deep Dives: Expert-led sessions covering the key topics and modules you'll need to master for the certification exam. You'll get an "expert's eye" on what's truly important for both the exam and real-world application.
  • Practical Insights: Get a feel for actual implementation scenarios and pick up best practices you can use right away.
  • Interactive Learning: Chat directly with SAP experts and get your burning questions answered live.
  • True Confidence: Step into your certification exam feeling completely ready and sure of your abilities.

Seriously, don't let this incredible chance to boost your skills and validate your expertise in SAP Sales Cloud Version 2 slip by!

Check out the link below for the full schedule, all the session details, and make sure to register today:

https://learning.sap.com/live-sessions/get-certified-sap-certified-associate-implementation-consultant-sap-sales-cloud-version-2

Invest in yourself and become the SAP Sales Cloud Version 2 implementation wizard everyone needs. Your next big career move is waiting!

entry.title: Launch of Role Based Certifications for SAP Business Suite for Partner Sales, Presales and CEE Roles
entry.content:
Dear SAP Partners!

*Updated with Dates for Partner Exclusive - Fast Track Sessions for the Role Based Certifications for Sales, Presales and CEE for SAP Business Suite. 

Fast Track your Role-Based Certification for the Partner Sales Executive

  • Registration  - Sept 4th , APJ/EMEA  & NAMER/LAC  Sessions

Fast Track your Role-Based Certification for the Partner Presales Consultant

  • Registration --  Sept 9th  , APJ/EMEA  & NAMER/LAC  Sessions

Fast Track your Role-Based Certification for the Partner Customer Engagement Executive

  • Registration – Aug 28th  , APJ/EMEA  & NAMER/LAC  Sessions

************************************************************************************************************************************

We have exciting news to share!

Our SAP Partner Sales, Presales, and Customer Engagement Executives – can now benefit from our freshly launched, Partner exclusive - Role Based Certifications for SAP Business Suite.

The three new SAP Business Suite certifications and associated Learning Journeys guide these revenue generating roles in the following ways

  • Positioning SAP Business Suite for Partner Sales Executive : Effectively positioning, leveraging SAP’s Partner strategy, understanding the sales methodologies & partner discounts leverage and engaging with proven approaches for driving customer value, aligning solutions to business priorities – all dedicated to selling SAP Business Suite.
    • Role: Sales Executive
    • Certification Code: C_PSSBS_2505
    • Link to Certification
    • 30 Questions, 1 hour, 67 % Cut off Score
  • Positioning SAP Business Suite for Partner Presales Consultant: Effectively positioning SAP Business Suite by applying SAP’s "AI-First, Suite First" strategy and deliver proper discovery interviews that lead to effective presentations and demonstrations aligned to the buying center persona approach.
    • Role: Presales Consultant
    • Certification Code: C_PPSBS_2505
    • Link to Certification
    • 30 Questions, 1 hour, 67 % Cut off Score
  • Positioning SAP Business Suite for Partner CEE: Supporting and driving effective customer engagement with proven approaches for guiding customers through the full value lifecycle.
    • Role: Customer Engagement Executive
    • Certification Code: C_PCSBS_2505
    • Link to Certification
    • 30 Questions, 1 hour, 67 % Cut off Score

All key content has been combined into one streamlined learning experience.  

Please note that access to the learning content requires an S-user tied to an SAP PartnerEdge entity. Questions are handled via the support request in the SAP Partner Portal or in SAP for Me (Get Assistance - SAP for Me). 

Why do you need these Learning Journeys and Certifications?

As a valued member of the extended SAP Partner Ecosystem, we believe it's essential for all our partners to stay closely aligned with SAP’s partner strategy and collaborate on the go-to-market momentum around the SAP Business Suite. To help you stay current on critical learning, as well as the latest commercial and packaging updates, we are delivering all relevant content through our Learning Journeys. By completing the learning journey and earning the associated certification, you position yourself as a trusted advisor—equipped to understand, articulate, and effectively sell the SAP Business Suite.

Highlights of the Certification Process

  • The certification process includes a practical hands-on test, that can be completed either by uploading a pitch or by running through a demo.
  • This is followed by a proctored certification exam consisting of 30 questions that can be completed in an hour.  

Fast Track Academies to support your certification Journey:

We will, soon be launching Fast Track Certification Academies for Role Based Certifications for SAP Business Suite to help guide our learners through the content of these Learning Journeys.  

Fast Track your Role-Based Certification for the Partner Sales Executive

  • Registration  - Sept 4th , APJ/EMEA  & NAMER/LAC  Sessions

Fast Track your Role-Based Certification for the Partner Presales Consultant

  • Registration --  Sept 9th  , APJ/EMEA  & NAMER/LAC  Sessions

Fast Track your Role-Based Certification for the Partner Customer Engagement Executive

  • Registration – Aug 28th  , APJ/EMEA  & NAMER/LAC  Sessions

We encourage all our partners to adopt these certifications and proudly wear the badge of being SAP Certified and a trusted advisor on all things, SAP Business Suite!

entry.title: Celebrating two Decades of Excellence: Atos Honored with SAP’s Golden Certificate
entry.content:
For the tenth consecutive time, Atos had its SAP global operations and services certified and, as a result, has been awarded SAP’s prestigious Golden Certificate. This makes Atos only the second global partner to receive this special recognition – a testament to the exceptional consistency and quality of their performance. As part of our partner ecosystem, Atos contributes to a group of globally certified partners recognized for consistently meeting SAP’s high standards across all regions. Their broad expertise across SAP solutions and their integration continues to earn our trust and respect. We deeply value our enduring partnership and appreciate Atos’s willingness to share their insights and experiences as a trusted, SAP-certified operations partner.

 

SAP: Atos positions itself as a pioneer in leveraging SAP Business Suite, cloud ERP, and AI to drive efficiency and innovation. What sets your approach to digital transformation apart from other providers, and how do you deliver measurable value across technologies for different industries?

Atos: New-age, AI-powered solutions from SAP are the core of our approach. Our strategy is to leverage platform capabilities from SAP BTP and hyperscalers to enable extended business solutions for application and business transformation. We provide value by leveraging comprehensive industry insights alongside our tailored industry solutions, consulting expertise, and transformation frameworks - all supported by advanced automation.

Our customers benefit from risk-mitigated transformation, cost-effective solutions, and increased user satisfaction by leveraging the full potential of SAP Business Suite on Cloud. Service Transformation is a key aspect of our approach for Application Management Services (AMS), where we leverage Joule for Developers, SAP Build process automation, and clean core with Atos Code-Pilot for custom-code reverse engineering.

 

SAP: What motivated you to pursue global certification for one of your services for the first time in 2004, and how do you reflect on that decision today?

Atos: Our strategy has always focused on achieving global presence and global recognition. To make that a reality, we set out to be globally certified with SAP in 2004. Now, with 20 years of continuous Global Certification across all key domains, we believe our decision has strengthened our business, enhanced customer trust, and supported SAP through robust partnerships, increased credibility, and expanded service offerings.

 

 

SAP: Since your initial certifications, you have expanded your global certification scope over the years. Not only have you re-certified your original certifications multiple times, but you have also added several new ones. Atos has recently renewed its five global certifications: SAP S/4HANA solutions operations, SAP SuccessFactors solutions operations, SAP HANA operations, SAP BTP operations, and DevOps. What role do the certifications, including the audit, play in your service offering?

Atos: Certifications have enabled us to identify areas for improvement in our offerings and recognize the strengths of Atos’s capabilities and services. Each certification cycle has resulted in the development of more comprehensive solutions that address customers’ IT transformation needs. Additionally, certifications assist in aligning our work with SAP’s product roadmap and preparing for future developments.

 

 

SAP: To what extent are the certifications helpful in your marketing activities and your communication with customers? Do you actively reference your global certifications when engaging with new customers?

Atos: Yes, we do highlight our certifications to new and existing customers. It helps in proving that we possess the right capabilities, offerings, experience, and follow SAP standards for each phase of the application management lifecycle. Certification showcases our credibility in the market, both to customers and our other partners in the SAP ecosystem (e.g., Microsoft, Amazon, Google).

 

Information on the certification program for operations partners and an overview of all certified partners can be found in the SAP Operations Partner Guide.

Visit OPC at SAP.com

entry.title: Ensure Smooth Integration: Your Quick Guide to SAP Data Services Compatibility ✅
entry.content:
📢Installation & Upgrade Guide for SAP Data Services 🛠️

💡When installing or upgrading, compatibility questions are bound to arise since we deal with different databases, drivers, applications and other components.

Compatibility Checklist

✅ Ensuring a Certified Environment To confirm compatibility with your target (new) version of SAP Data Services, verify the following:

🔍Information platform services (IPS) / Business Intelligence Platform (BIP)
🔍 Operating System
🔍 Database (Repository / Source & Target)
🔍 Drivers
🔍 Browser
🔍 Cloud Platforms
🔍 Cloud Storage
🔍 Message Client Library
🔍 Etc.

Understanding the Compatibility Legend

🌟Make sure you understand its legend, as it is crucial to proceed:

  • For example: If item y was certified in version 4.x SPx Patch x, it will be considered as supported/compatible for that version and above until the version being mentioned as deprecated in the PAM in the future.

🖥Designer Client Tool

Application client tool, named as Designer, needs to be under the same version, support pack and Patch of SAP Data Services Job Server to avoid any compatibility within the Job Server and CMS (component from IPS/BI application).

Because of this need for harmony, the Designer tool can't share a machine with another BI/IPS installation, even if you're not using that CMS connection for SAP Data Services. But don't worry! If you need IPS/BI installed, just make sure it's compatible according to our compatibility matrix.

🔗 3322026 - Can BOE/BI/IPS Platform Client Tools and Designer Client Tool coexist in the same machine? - SAP Data Services

📚Useful Resources

Each SAP product has its Product Availability Matrix (PAM) and Maintenance Strategy. For more information on how to access these, check out the KBA below:

🔗 1338845 - How to find Product Availability Matrix (PAM) / Supported Platforms Documentation for SAP BusinessObjects products (BI/IPS, DS, IS)?

Visit the SAP Data Services for detailed information on Installation, Upgrade, and Migration steps. Remember to change the documentation version to your desired SAP Data Services version.

Recommendation

💡 We strongly recommend installing/upgrading to the latest certified version between IPS/BIP and SAP Data Services to avoid any known issues that have been fixed.

  • If upgrading is not possible, before proceeding with the installation or upgrade, check the Release Notes for that version under the SAP Knowledge Base. There might be known issues that could affect your daily work.
  • This will help you identify and be prepared to apply any available workaround!

🌟If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to reach out to SAP Support and search under our Knowledge Base!

📌If you found this helpful or interesting, I would really appreciate a 'Kudo' to let me know! Your feedback means a lot. 😊

entry.title: Introducing the Get Certified Series for SAP Customer Data Cloud
entry.content:
We are thrilled to announce the launch of our new live session series: Get Certified for SAP Customer Data Cloud. This series is designed to help you prepare for and succeed in the C_C4H62 certification: SAP Certified Associate - Implementation Consultant - SAP Customer Data Cloud. Our certified expert trainers will guide you through all the relevant topic areas, ensuring you have the best chance of passing the certification exam.

Series Overview

The Get Certified live session series aims to provide you with expert-guided support to complement your self-study activities. By participating in these sessions, you will gain a deeper understanding of the exam format, scope, and key topics, enhancing your readiness to attempt the certification.

Prerequisites

To make the most of this series, we recommend that you:

  • Attend our Instructional-Led-Training.
  • Work through the learning journeys linked to this blog post.
  • Perform the hands-on practice exercises.
  • Join all the live sessions to benefit from the trainer's expertise and insights.

Session Breakdown

Each session will focus on specific topics relevant to the C_C4H62 certification exam. Here’s a breakdown of the content covered in each session:

Session 1: Kick Off (1 hour)

  • Outlining the live session series
  • Introducing the certification
  • Explaining the types of questions
  • Providing tips for preparation
  • Working through sample questions in the exam interface

Session 2: SAP Customer Identity and Access (2 hours)

  • Deep dive into SAP Customer Identity and Access
  • Key concepts and practical applications
  • Exam-focused insights and tips

Session 3: SAP Customer Data Cloud Authentication Methods (1 hour)

  • Understanding various authentication methods
  • Best practices and implementation strategies
  • Exam preparation for authentication topics

Session 4: SAP Enterprise Consent and Preference Management (1 hour)

  • Exploring consent and preference management in SAP Customer Data Cloud
  • How to configure and manage consent
  • Practical tips for the exam

Session 5: Developing and Integration with SAP Customer Data Cloud (2 hours)

  • Development and integration techniques
  • Hands-on exercises and best practices
  • Exam-specific guidance

Learning Objectives

By the end of this Get Certified live session series, you will be well-prepared to:

  • Understand the format and scope of the C_C4H62 certification exam.
  • Master key topics related to SAP Customer Data Cloud, including identity and access, authentication methods, consent and preference management, and integration techniques.
  • Feel confident in attempting the C_C4H62 certification exam.

Relevant Learning Journeys

To maximize your preparation(best before attending the get certified series), review the following Trainings and Learning Journeys:

  • Managing Clean Core for SAP S/4HANA Cloud
  • SAP Customer Data Cloud Implementation Training  
  • Exploring SAP Customer Data Cloud Essentials
  • From Onboarding to Governance: Mastering SAP Customer Data Cloud for B2B

How to Participate

 

For registration, simply log in with your valid Learning Hub subscription (for SAP internal teams, it’s FREE) and register to reserve your spot.

Get ready to enhance your SAP skills and take your career to the next level with the Get Certified Series for SAP Customer Data Cloud!

Don’t miss this opportunity to become a certified SAP Customer Data Cloud Implementation Consultant. See you in the sessions!

entry.title: SONDA Gallery is SAP Certified for SAP BTP with Generative AI Capabilities
entry.content:
Artificial intelligence is rapidly transforming enterprise software, bringing smarter automation, contextual insights, and enhanced user experiences to business-critical systems. In tax and accounting, where precision and compliance are essential, AI is helping organizations to manage complex data with greater agility and confidence. As regional SAP ICC representative and having worked closely with SAP Partners on their solutions' certification projects, I’ve seen firsthand how solutions that combine generative AI with robust platforms like SAP are redefining usability and performance. These innovations go beyond automation, delivering intelligent assistance tailored to the evolving demands of modern finance teams.

SONDA, an SAP partner with headquarters in Chile and strong presence in Brazil, has been a driving force in digital transformation across the Americas. With expertise in tax management, SONDA delivers solutions to help companies navigate regulatory complexity and operational challenges through a portfolio of SAP-based solutions, automation and process integration.

Among these, SONDA Gallery stands out as a tax-accounting solution for Brazil. Originally co-innovated with SAP in 2016 and built natively on SAP HANA, Sonda Gallery is designed to support Brazilian tax legislation with high performance and real-time data analysis. Evolving the solution across the time to adopt SAP Business Technology Platform (SAP BTP) and integrated with SAP Document and Reporting Compliance (SAP DRC), the solution now features generative AI capabilities, including a virtual assistant trained on product documentation. This assistant helps users navigate the system, summarize notes, translate content, and identify key deliverables—bringing a new level of intelligence to their tax management solution.

Sonda has been a long time SAP partner and has regularly certified its solutions with SAP Integration and Certification Center (SAP ICC) support. Since 2020 Sonda Gallery has been following SAP strategy toward taxes for Brazil and being SAP Certified, initially through an SAP Tax Declaration Framework for Brazil (SAP TDF) scenario, and later through an SAP DRC for Brazil scenario. With the new Built with SAP BTP Utilizing Generative AI Hub Capabilities (BTP-EXT-GenAI) certification scenario Sonda identified an opportunity to reposition and offer customers with a solution based on SAP BTP and using SAP Business AI, that is now tested against SAP Global AI Ethics Policy requirements.

However, the certification criteria did not initially account for Sonda Gallery’s ABAP-based authentication model, which relied on SAP Logon Tickets and classic ABAP objects. Rather than delay the process, SONDA responded with remarkable speed and precision. In just two weeks, the company re-engineered Sonda Gallery’s authentication to fully adopt SAP BTP Cloud Identity services, a modern and secure mechanism native to SAP BTP platform. This migration not only met the certification requirements but also enhanced the solution’s flexibility, to provide enhanced identity and access management (IAM) across both SAP and Microsoft environments.

Completing the certification on time was a testament to SONDA’s technical agility and deep understanding of SAP architecture. It also reinforced the company’s commitment to delivering future-ready solutions that meet the highest standards of security, usability, and compliance, tested through SAP Certification. With this achievement, SONDA Gallery is now officially SAP Certified with SAP Business AI, positioning it as a solution that is taking advantage of the latest technologies provided by SAP for the benefit of our joint customers.

entry.title: Advance Your Career as a Certified SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition Project Manager
entry.content:
Around 60% of cloud buyers told IDC’s Cloud Pulse Survey in October 2024 that their business’ IT or digital infrastructure currently requires major transformation, and 82% said their cloud also requires modernization. In response to these pressing industry needs, effective project management has become essential, particularly for navigating complex cloud-based initiatives. The new certification for SAP Certified Associate - Managing SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition Projects (C_S4PM2) provides a unique opportunity for professionals to become certified project managers, equipping them to lead transformative digital efforts with expertise and strategic insight. 

Designed for Project Managers, Consultants, and Technical Leads, this certification empowers you to excel in managing SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition implementations, positioning you to become a strategic leader in your organization's digital strategy, providing direction and specialist knowledge in project execution. 

How to prepare for this certification 

You can prepare for the exam in your own pace, by completing the "Managing SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition Projects" learning journey, designed to provide comprehensive insight into SAP S/4HANA Cloud project management. With free access to the learning journey, you can deepen your expertise of managing SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition projects, spotlighting SAP tools and strategic implementation methodologies. Among these, the RISE with SAP Methodology stands out as a vital, holistic approach tailored for cloud transformation journeys. 

Additionally, SAP Community blog posts provide some supporting information to deepen your understanding and preparation: 

  • 12 Things that SAP implementation methodology SAP Activate tells you to do 
  • Planning your System Conversion to SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition following SAP Activate 
  • SAP Activate for RISE with SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition now available by Deployment Journey 
  • Conversion Guide for SAP S/4HANA 2023 for SAP S/4HANA and SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition 2023
  • Review the SAP Activate Minute videos in this playlist. 

You can also explore more insights about SAP Activate for SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition on SAP for Me, and take a look at the release notes.  

As a prerequisite, candidates should possess project management experience, preferably in ERP implementation, especially SAP Cloud-related projects. Additionally, hands-on experience with SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition solutions, knowledge of SAP Cloud ALM, and experience managing cloud-based SAP projects are beneficial.

Get started today 

Achieving the SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition certification allows you to become a crucial asset in driving your organization's growth and innovation. This certification validates your 

competency in integrating business goals with technical solutions, enhancing your leadership role in cloud project management.  

Certified learners must regularly update their skills and keep certifications valid by completing mandatory annual assessments before expiration. With an SAP Learning Hub subscription, you can take these assessments anytime during your certification's validity.  

Build the skills you need on the SAP Learning site and get inspired by reading learner stories on SAP Community, ask questions and connect with fellow learners. When you’re ready, take your certification exam and start shaping your industry's future!

entry.title: Your Step-by-Step Guide to SAP Sales Cloud V2 Certification
entry.content:
The SAP Certified Associate - Implementation Consultant - SAP Sales Cloud Version 2   exam is designed for professionals who want to demonstrate their ability to configure, implement, and use the  new SAP Sales Cloud solution. With organizations increasingly relying on cloud-based sales tools, this credential sets you apart as someone who can deliver value through modern, intelligent sales processes.

If you’re planning to pursue this certification, here’s a structured roadmap using the official resources available.

Step 1: Start with the Learning Journey

Your first stop should be the Learning Journey: Implementing SAP Sales Cloud V2. This guided path introduces you to the fundamentals and provides structured exercises to practice key business user and configuration skills.

The Learning Journey covers the essentials:

  • Daily workflows for sales representatives and managers
  • Core capabilities and navigation of Sales Cloud V2
  • Machine learning fundamentals and generative AI overview
  • Integration with Microsoft Teams and mobile app functionality

By following it through, you’ll gain both conceptual understanding and practical hands-on experience.

Step 2: Join the “Get Certified” Live Session Series

Next, enroll in the “Get Certified: SAP Certified Associate – Implementation Consultant – SAP Sales Cloud V2” live session series. These structured, expert-led sessions are designed to complement your independent study with:

  • A Kickoff session (1 hour), which walks through exam format, question types, preparation strategies, and sample questions

  • A series of five additional 1-hour sessions, each focusing on key Learning Journey units

By participating, you gain direct guidance from certified trainers, reinforce your understanding of the most exam-relevant content, and practice with realistic sample questions—all of which are invaluable for aligning study with exam demands.

Step 3: Optional Microlearning Videos for Just-in-Time Insights

If you’d like to reinforce particular areas or learn on the go, consider exploring the bite-sized microlearning videos  in the Sales Cloud V2 category. These videos are concise, accessible, and perfect for filling knowledge gaps just when you need it.

Step 4: Hands-on Practical Test (Required to Unlock Exam Booking)

Before you can book the certification exam, SAP requires proof of hands-on competence. This is fulfilled by the “Demonstrating the Value of SAP Sales Cloud Version 2” practical test within your Learning Journey. 

If you have gone through the Learning Journey exercises, this step should be straightforward. The tasks in the test are based on what you’ve already practiced, making it a natural extension of your preparation. Once passed, the “Schedule Exam” button becomes available, allowing you to book your certification exam. 

Step 5: Prepare for the Certification Exam

Next, focus your preparation on the exam content itself:

  • Implementation basics and clean-core principles
  • Master data management (accounts, contacts, products, pricing)
  • Sales processes including leads, opportunities, contracts, quotations, and orders
  • User management, personalization, and security
  • Use this framework to guide your revision and ensure full coverage.

Step 5: Practice and Review

After completing the learning resources, reinforce your knowledge through practice:

  • Revisit exercises in the Learning Journey

  • Test yourself with sample exam questions, if available

Consistent review will help you move from memorization to confident application of concepts.

Final Thoughts

The path to SAP Sales Cloud V2 certification is clear when you use the right resources. Start with the Learning Journey, take advantage of quarterly expert sessions and study according to the exam guide. By combining structured learning with consistent practice, you’ll be ready to validate your expertise and move forward as a trusted SAP Sales Cloud consultant.

entry.title: From Movie Theater to Global Stage: How a "Gully Boy" Moment Changed Everything
entry.content:
In a darkened movie theater in Amsterdam, Nagesh Polu made a decision that would seem absurd to most people. Fifteen minutes into the film, he'd already guessed the ending (he is an avid movie goer, so this happens often). So, he did what any dedicated learner would do—he pulled out his phone and started studying SAP SuccessFactors materials instead.

"That's probably the weirdest place I've ever studied," Nagesh laughs, "but it perfectly captures who I am. I can't waste a moment when there's something new to learn."

Nagesh's story begins in Chirala, India, where he earned his bachelor's degree. His parents had instilled in him what he calls a "do-or-die mindset"—a philosophy that would prove prophetic.

 

"My father taught me that success isn't just about personal achievement," Nagesh reflects. "It's about lifting your family and extended family along with you. Living simply, staying cheerful, standing by our people—these weren't just values, they were survival strategies.” Those early years built something invaluable: resilience. Little did he know that this small-town foundation would eventually support a career spanning continents and transforming global enterprises.

Starting as a sales trainee, Nagesh eventually found himself at YASH Technologies, working with traditional SAP HCM presales teams and constantly hitting walls. During one particularly frustrating project estimations discussions, a senior consultant delivered advice that would change everything: "If you really want to shape the future, learn SAP—it's where the biggest challenges and opportunities are."

But it was SAP's acquisition of SuccessFactors that created Nagesh's true "lightbulb moment." While others saw a complex transition, he saw infinite possibility. What happened next was nothing short of extraordinary.

SAP Learning Hub became Nagesh's compass—his "go-to resource for quickly building knowledge and completing prerequisites." The comprehensive training, hands-on exercises, and certification preparation materials became the foundation of his transformation. The breakthrough came during a late-night session in his Amsterdam home office. He was trying to build a complex report. Hours of trial and error had left him exhausted and frustrated. Then, using the detailed training materials and practical examples from SAP Learning Hub, it clicked. "I sat there thinking, 'I can build anything with this.' The rush was incredible”, he remembers.

Here's where Nagesh's story takes a surprising turn. He expected SAP learning to be purely technical—a skills upgrade to advance his career. Instead, it transformed something he never anticipated: his ability to think like a business leader. The intensive learning journey wouldn't have been possible without key support. Nagesh credits his wife as his anchor, whose unwavering support at home enabled his relentless pursuit of learning without interruption and his mentors across his journey.

Colleagues began noticing that Nagesh brought both big-picture strategy and hands-on expertise to projects. He wasn't just solving technical problems; he was solving business problems.

As Nagesh accumulated SAP Certifications— through rigorous study with SAP Learning Hub—each one became what he calls "another layer of armor."

"Every SAP Certification reinforced my ability not only to tackle complex projects but also to lead others through them," he shares. "They weren't just credentials—they were confidence multipliers."

The SAP Certifications opened doors to high-impact global assignments and helped him earn client trust more quickly. But the real transformation was internal: from a small-town graduate to a leader who could walk into any boardroom with complete confidence.

Then came the career-defining moment that validated years of relentless learning. A global client was facing a high-stakes SAP SuccessFactors implementation with a brutal deadline. Their previous attempts had failed. The pressure was immense. Nagesh delivered.

"When their CHRO told me that our solution had transformed how they manage talent worldwide, all those years of learning—including those movie theater study sessions—suddenly made perfect sense," he recalls. Today, Nagesh's learning journey continues to impact others in unexpected ways. He's mentored colleagues through their first SAP Certifications, elevated his entire team's capabilities, and regularly shares insights through blogs that help the wider SAP community.

 "My learning journey has been consistent, persistent, and purpose-driven," he notes. "It should be as natural as checking your messages or having your morning coffee."

When asked what movie would capture his learning journey, Nagesh's answer is immediate: "Gully Boy—Apna time aayega" (Our time will come). It perfectly captures his philosophy: that with persistent learning and unwavering commitment, anyone from anywhere can rise to extraordinary heights. From a movie theater in Amsterdam to global boardrooms, from a small coastal town to becoming a trusted advisor to multinational corporations, Nagesh's story proves a simple truth: learning isn't just about acquiring skills—it's about transforming your entire life.

Ready to start your own transformation? Benefit from tailored and self-paced learning opportunities that meet you when and where you learn best on the SAP Learning site. Get certified to demonstrate your expertise and boost your career.

entry.title: Prep for your first Certification with a SAP Business Suite Bootcamp
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

Whether you're a student aspiring to break into the tech world, a career-driven professional, or an SAP partner looking to elevate your skills, a new SAP Business Suite certification is a great first certification to begin adding SAP credentials to your CV.

Register for the September 30th bootcamp

Understanding the SAP Business Suite is crucial for those looking to carve out a niche in the SAP ecosystem. If you already have access to a SAP Learning Hub subscription, sign up here for our expert-led bootcamp.

Expert Guidance: Work through your learning journey with insights from a renowned SAP University Alliances professor. Benefit from tailored coaching and practical advice that will be instrumental in passing your certification exam on the first go.

Comprehensive Learning: Understand SAP Business Suite's structure and functionalities from a high level. Get familiarized with the need to identify client requirements and configuring SAP solutions tailored to addressing their infrastructure problems.

Practical Knowledge: Equip yourself with the skills to initiate meaningful conversations with potential interviewers and while growing your network - explain how SAP Business Suite adds both technical and business value across varied industries.

 

What is the SAP Business Suite certification?

Check out my blog introducing the topic here.

Here is what you need to study:

1. Discovering SAP for Students 

2. Positioning SAP Business Suite

How can I access this bootcamp and certification for free?

This is free for all students and faculty across the world. You first need to sign up for SAP Learning Hub, student edition to access this free of charge. Commercial SAP Learning Hub subscribers can register in the same way as they would for any other Live Sessions on offer.

Best of luck with your exam!

David
